At Deep Trekker, we work hard and get stuff done, but we have fun doing it. Our above ground and underwater remotely operated vehicles (ROVs) are used across the world with a variety of applications and users.

We are constantly challenging ourselves to push the next frontier of technology, while striving to provide our customers with simple and reliable solutions. With passionate rapid innovation, Deep Trekker has experienced continued success and growth since our inception and we are always looking to grow our amazing team.

We are currently seeking a versatile and talented C++ Software Engineer with an embedded focus. If you are a highly motivated developer who is passionate about developing mobile robots and underwater drones this might be the job for you.
In this role, you will work remotely with a team of passionate developers, working on our embedded linux controller, to provide intuitive and user friendly features.

We are a US-based company looking for full-time remote software engineers. We are especially interested in people who think outside the box and are focused on functionality, scalability, and changing the way online marketing is done.
ONEcount is a leading Customer Data Platform, combining the engagement actions of web visitors across multiple data channels for a single, actionable customer view.

We run our powerful, SAAS platform from dual data centers for ultimate redundancy and geographic load balancing. It's a fast-paced environment where learning is ever-present, and the standards are high.
Will be involved in development and delivery of high traffic ecommerce websites.
Understanding business requirements and translating them into technical solutions.
Ideal candidate will be hardworking and open to learn and grow with company.

Strong coding experience in Python / PHP and other programming languages preferred

We’re looking for a top-notch Software Engineer who always sweats the small stuff and cares about impeccable code. If you see glitches as an enjoyable challenge rather than a hardship and if you are willing to put in long hours to see a project come to fruition, get in touch with us today.
Develop a new software product from the ground up, staying true to our company’s core values and needs while lending your own creativity to the mix
Expand existing software to meet the changing needs of our key demographics
